lead_paragraph: Guard David Wesley signed a two-year contract with the Cavaliers yesterday. He averaged 9.9 points, 2.5 rebounds and 2.9 assists in 71 games for Houston.
snippet: Guard David Wesley signed a two-year contract with the Cavaliers yesterday. He averaged 9.9 points, 2.5 rebounds and 2.9 assists in 71 games for Houston.
